network_overview: A single Diameter Gx/Gy/S6a-type signaling exchange between 10.193.1.134 and 10.47.73.86 shows one request (Cmd-8388636) answered with DIAMETER_UNABLE_TO_DELIVER (3002), yielding 0 % success for this procedure. No user-plane, SIP, or other protocols were captured.

pattern_matches.explanation: The server explicitly returned 3002, indicating it could not deliver the request to the final destination (downstream peer or internal service).

observations.finding: Exactly two request attempts and one failure response in 3 s; no retries after 3002
Only Diameter Base protocol traffic observed; no GTP, SIP, or user-plane packets

root_causes.issue: Downstream Diameter peer unreachable or service unavailable
root_causes.description: Responding node (10.47.73.86) returned 3002, meaning it could not forward the request to the intended final destination or internal application.
root_causes.impact: Policy or authentication procedure failed; subscriber service (e.g., bearer activation, policy install) rejected.
root_causes.confidence_justification: Explicit 3002 result code in answer message per RFC 6733.

inconclusive_aspects.aspect: Which Diameter application (Gx, Gy, S6a, Rx, etc.) failed
inconclusive_aspects.reason: Application-ID AVP not shown in decoded packets
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Full AVP decode including Application-ID, Auth-Application-ID, or specific command name
Longer capture on same interface or end-to-end trace including GTP/SIP

inconclusive_aspects.aspect: Root reason for delivery failure (network, config, or peer outage)
inconclusive_aspects.reason: Only base result-code 3002 observed; no error-diagnostics AVP
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Diameter answer with Error-Message or Failed-AVP AVPs, plus logs from responding node

recommendations.action: Check downstream peer reachability and service status on node 10.47.73.86 for the Command code 8388636
recommendations.rationale: 3002 explicitly flags delivery failure; peer or internal service may be down or mis-configured.

recommendations.action: Collect full Diameter decode (include Application-ID, Route-Record, Error-Message AVPs) to identify exact service impacted
recommendations.rationale: Determines whether policy, charging, or authentication layer is affected.

session_analysis.signaling_health: One Diameter procedure failed with 3002; no other signaling observed.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: No GTP-U or user-plane traffic captured.
session_analysis.voice_quality: Not observable at this capture point.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: Only control-plane Diameter present; no user-plane or SIP correlation possible.
